name: Dragonborne (entozoon)
description:
Z - Flap your wings
X - Fire
Left/right arrows - Pitch

Built this demo a long time ago, 2016ish. Absolutely fantastic mechanic, if I do say so myself - a 2D bird-flying feeling.. never played a game like that. It could be better, and obviously fleshed out into an actual game but I think I was genuinely onto something!
